segments.text: Do you object to drinking black tea , Mr.Zhang ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that is why I never drink it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you drink green tea , then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very seldom , because tea has tannin which may be harmful to one's health .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But if the tea is good and well prepared , it will do much good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not only can it appease one's thirst , but it can also refresh one when tired .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true , but it must not be allowed to stand long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because if you drink a kind of tea which has been prepared for some time before , it will do you harm .
segments.speaker: S2
